name: Engage Us
description:
You spawn in a world full of enemies ready to hunt you down until you are left alone in the graveyard.

Your objective? Think about every move you make and try to get as much XP as possible in order to dominate your opponents. Or simply choose a different approach and be the last one standing. How? Crush all your enemies.

As one said: - 'A dead enemy is no longer a enemy, because he is dead'.

The game offers you many actions that you can perform through it. Be wise and choose each action carefully. A wrong move is garanteed to cost you...

A minimalist local multiplayer strategy game developed in Unity3D by:

- José Braga,

- Diogo Antunes,

- José Simões,

- Guilherme Afonso,

- João Carnide

- Bruno Sério

vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv

Support the project at: paypal.me/supportMexicanFox
